Blog Archive

Hi! My name is Siddharth Subramaniyam. Currently, I'm a CS Masters student at Texas A&M University, College Station, where I work on Bioinformatics in Ioerger lab and Sketch Recognition in SRL. I am interested in interdisciplinary research and building large scale systems.

In the past, I've worked at RetailMeNot and VIMANA.
Other things I enjoy include building stuff, table tennis, soccer, cooking, biking, hiking and fitness.

Recently, I've started keeping track of the books I read.
